Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.14.6
Entries.Description:
IMPORTANT!

Mozilla have made the decision to retire the service and new measurements are no longer accepted. Read more.

The option to upload to Mozilla Location Services temporarily remains available, but I will only try to upload the measurements if custom MLS-compatible address is provided in Preferences.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.14.5
Messages: Add check for Internet connection before starting upload.
Add option to use custom MLS-compatible server for uploads.
Display a warning when attempting to export database when there is no data to upload.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.14.4
Messages: Fix issue with requesting background location permission if no location permission was granted before.
Improve readability of message when there are no measurements on the device.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.14.3
Messages: Fix 5G (NR) cell Tracking Area Code accepted values range.
Use dialog instead of notification for error reporting in F-Droid builds.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.14.2
Messages: Add cell discovery date to CSV export and JSON broadcast.
